thread.section_title: Euro Car Parts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Euro Car Parts | www.eurocarparts.com | 3 of 75
thread.title: Deborah Ajijola
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Deborah Ajijola

author: Deborah Ajijola
title: Deborah Ajijola
text:
I bought some product on line. It was at the time of 30% discount on all products online. At the checkout, I was not given the prompt to put in the promo code so I couldn't get the discount.
I had an online chat with a member of staff called Samuel. He was able to get me the discount on one of the products and explained that the other 2 were not included in the promo. I was pleased that I was able to make some savings. Thanks to Samuel.
